resources.string: Emma Watson was born on April 15, 1990, in Paris, France, but raised in England. The actress got her breakthrough role as a child in the hugely successful Harry Potter film franchise. \n\nAfter committing to the Harry Potter series for a decade, Watson has transitioned into a popular adult model and actress, having appeared in the popular films The Perks of Being a Wallflower, My Week with Marilyn and Beauty and the Beast.

Recent projects:
 
Beauty and the Beast (2017) 
The Circle (2017) 
The Million Dollar Nickel (2016) 
The Colony (2015) 
Noah (2014) 
The Perks of Being a Wallflower (2012) 
Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 (2011)

Won:
 
2017 :: Best Actor in a Movie 
2014 :: British Artist of the Year 
2011 :: Capri Ensemble Cast Award 
2005-2007/2009 :: Best Actress - Bravo Otto 
2007 :: Best Performance by a Female
